metadata.title: 2DNS - DNS Reflection Service

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to secure your servers without domain names

steps.title: Enter Your Server IP
steps.description: Start by entering your server's IP address in our system. This is the server you want to secure with an SSL certificate.

steps.title: Get Your DNS Name
steps.description: Our system generates a unique DNS name that points to your server IP address. This DNS name is stateless and doesn't require registration.

steps.title: Apply for SSL Certificate
steps.description: Use the generated DNS name to apply for an SSL certificate from any certificate authority that supports DNS validation.

steps.title: Secure Your Server
steps.description: Install the SSL certificate on your server to enable HTTPS, securing your connections and improving trust.
